content: marker k1 ssk knit until 3sts before eor k2tog k1 last heel row rs k across until 2sts left k2tog last 2sts round 3 k all sts knit across the front instep until m and repeat rnds 2-3 until you have 24 26 k2tog the last 2 sts from the heel 28 30 sts left on your needles repeat only round 2 until you have 16 18 video instruction of the heel 20 22 construction cut yarn leaving a long tail make sure https //youtu be/ixxflq_m0hi you have even stitches on both sides 8 9 10 11 on front and back close toe with the kitchener stitch technique page 3 thank you so much for getting a copy of my indulgence socks pattern i hope you will enjoy knitting and wearing them as much as i enjoyed designing them it really means a lot to me that you picked one of my patterns and i would love to see what you make out of it your knitting progress and finished piece if you are on instagram please share and tag #indulgencesocks #zwitchz @zwitchz or you can add a project on ravelry if you have any questions regarding this pattern or any other enquiries please get in touch susied@zwitchz com happy knitting pattern copyright © 2022 zwitchz ltd all rights reserved pattern designed written and owned by susie dringus this pattern is for personal use only and may not be sold copied distributed or any finished garments made from this pattern may not be sold page 4
